caption.center: JERRY L. COOLEY v. VALERIE VAN DYKE COOLEY.

opinion.posture: In re Valerie Van Dyke Cooley, applying for supervisory writs of certiorari, prohibitionWest Page 272 and mandamus. Parish of Beauregard. No. C-337-81.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Granted. Trial court is ordered to hold a hearing forthwith on relator's rule to continue alimony pendente lite during pendency of these proceedings; otherwise denied.
